thread.section_title: Pod 39 Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Funky hotel
thread.title_full: Funky hotel - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MHOF
title: Funky hotel
text:
Great hotel. Very popular bar and restaurant on the ground floor. The menu tended towards tex-mex food. The room was small but big enough for us. We had bunk beds to save on space with a bathroom behind frosted glass - you would need to be either related or very good friends to share this room! Telly on both bunk beds! Very comfortable beds and spotlessly clean. Roof top terrace gave great views over the city.
Near Grand Central Station and about 15 mins walk from Times Square. Very helpful Concierge and easy check in. They offer their own shuttle to JFK Airport for $65.
